Name: Half-Elf
Description: Often caught between the worlds of their progenitor races, half-elves are a race of both grace and contradiction. Their dual heritage and natural gifts often create brilliant diplomats and peacemakers, but half-elves are often susceptible to an intense and even melancholic isolation, realizing that they are never truly part of elven or human society.

RacialTraits.Low-Light Vision: Elves can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

RacialTraits.Adaptability: Half-elves receive Skill Focus as a bonus feat at 1st level.

RacialTraits.Elf Blood: Half-elves count as both elves and humans for any effect related to race.

RacialTraits.Elven Immunities: Half-elves are immune to magic sleep effects and get a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against enchantment spells and effects.

RacialTraits.Keen Senses: Elves receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

RacialTraits.Multitalented: Half-elves choose two favored classes at 1st level and gain 1 additional hit point or skill point whenever they take a level in either one of those classes.
